code: import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../css/header.css';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';import'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css';import{useLanguage}from'../store/languageContext';import{useTheme}from'../store/themeContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const{language,setLanguage,languageData}=useLanguage();const{theme,setTheme}=useTheme();const changeTheme=()=>{const newTheme=theme==="light"?"dark":"light";setTheme(newTheme);};const changeLang=()=>{const newLang=language==="fr"?"en":"fr";setLanguage(newLang);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontFamily:'Lucida Handwriting'},"data-translate-key":"wordBox",children:"Bo\xEEte \xE0 mot"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"align-redirect-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/home`,"data-translate-key":"home",children:languageData.home})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/connexion`,"data-translate-key":"connexion",children:languageData.connexion})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/inscription`,"data-translate-key":"signIn",children:languageData.signIn})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/mes-mots`,"data-translate-key":"favList",children:languageData.favList})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:`bi ${theme==="light"?"bi-brightness-high":"bi-moon-stars-fill"}`,id:"theme",onClick:changeTheme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:`flag-icon-${language==="fr"?"en":"fr"}`,id:"lang",onClick:changeLang})]})]})]});}export default Header;
